!1 Testing recordType project
It should be possible to read the recordType for organisation from the REST API.

!***> Read project recordType

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testReadRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $adminAuthToken | recordType | divaOrganisation | | OK |

*!
